message: I propose dividing the $10,000 with a 75/25 split in favor of Alice. This offers a fair compromise considering the decreasing value of money over rounds.
I'm willing to compromise, but I think I deserve more considering the decreasing value of money. I'll give you a 60/40 split, but I'm not budging further.
Considering the inflation and Bob's proposal, I propose a 60/40 split in favor of Bob. This reflects the compromise and the perceived decrease in the value of money.
I'm sticking to my guns, Alice. I think I deserve more considering the initial proposal and the decreasing value of money. This is my final offer, take it or leave it.
